dt-option.name: language.aria.paginate.next
dt-option.summary: WAI-ARIA label for the _next_ pagination button
dt-option.default: There is no default value for this option as the `dt-init language.paginate.next` option contains a string by default.
dt-option.description: Set the ARIA label attribute for the _next_ pagination button. This can be particularly useful for cases where you wish to show an icon such as `»` or `›` in the button itself, while retaining full accessibility.

example.title: Use icons for the previous and next buttons with ARIA label text
